Package Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.services.calculation

Class DamageCalculationService

java.lang.Object
Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.services.calculation.DamageCalculationService
@Service public class DamageCalculationService extends Object
A calculation service to find out the damage output of a loadout.

    • DamageCalculationService

      @Autowired public DamageCalculationService(BaseDamageService baseDamageService, BonusDamageService bonusDamageService, ModifierBoostService boostService)
      The constructor for DamageCalculationService.
      Parameters:
      baseDamageService - A service that calculates the base damage from a loadout.
      bonusDamageService - A service that calculates the bonus (additive) damage from a loadout.
      boostService - A service that is used to store and apply boosts to Modifier's values.

      A method that calculates the total damage output of a given loadout.
      Parameters:
      loadout - The loadout being used to determine the damage output.
      Returns:
      A Double value of the loadout's damage output.
